data.lyric:
[ti:Backdoor (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Durk]
[al:Backdoor (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Backdoor (Explicit) - Lil Durk
[00:00.16]Lyrics by：Durk Banks/Malik Bynoe-Fisher/Joshua Samuel/Braylen Rembert/Lachlan Gentle
[00:00.32]Composed by：Durk Banks/Malik Bynoe-Fisher/Joshua Samuel/Braylen Rembert/Lachlan Gentle
[00:00.49]Malik on the beat
[00:03.48]Ayo Bleu
[00:04.72]No no no no
[00:08.44]Yeah yeah yeah
[00:09.20]Aura
[00:10.22]No no no no
[00:12.00]Turn Me Up Josh
[00:14.39]Whoa oh oh
[00:24.55]Them n***as act like they don't need us
[00:26.70]They do everything we do they wanna be us
[00:29.59]Foenem takin' ecstasy they tryna T up
[00:32.35]He rather go and blow a bag instead of re-up
[00:35.10]You wasn't on that block when that s**t was goin' on
[00:37.51]I wasn't worried about the other side when that s**t was goin' on
[00:40.35]And we don't hang with different n***as don't ask us what we on
[00:43.34]The only time we'll beat the case you pull out camera phones
[00:46.07]I used to draw Lil' Mo' name on the styrofoam
[00:49.09]I had to teach the grown n***as right from wrong
[00:52.21]Why the state had told the jury "They tryna indict us all"
[00:54.94]The lawyers got them affidavits they better sign them all hm
[00:58.58]I had a bad b***h off the 'Gram she let her titties hang
[01:01.59]She told Bandz I bought her a Birkin I told her anything
[01:04.34]I was ridin' 'round with guns in that Bentley thang
[01:07.11]We puttin' stickers on our drums that's a city thang
[01:09.97]I hate the n***as who be tryna switch the block up
[01:12.97]I be with the killers who would change a n***a roster
[01:16.01]I'm from the part of the city watch your partner
[01:18.78]You ain't did s**t to same n***a who shot ya
[01:21.76]'Fore you leave that door gotta pick your Glock up
[01:24.53]Can't nut in no more w***es I got that from my momma
[01:27.49]Shuttin' down the stores you do that with these commas
[01:30.42]You had me at my lowest I'm ridin' 'round with choppers
[01:33.11]Oh
[01:36.09]Close that backdoor can't get shaked at by my homie
[01:38.94]No no no no no yeah yeah
[01:42.36]Close that backdoor 'cause I know that s**t's phony
[01:44.90]No no no no no whoa
[01:47.78]Close that backdoor can't get snaked by my homie
[01:53.24]Oh
[01:53.62]Close that backdoor 'cause I know this love phony
[01:58.47]That's a bet
[02:00.09]I'm The Voice that mean Dee-Dee he the threat
[02:02.65]Don't get stressed 'cause foenem tweakin' off the X
[02:05.38]I know what happened to your homie don't be next
[02:08.58]He got that get back for his block I tilt my hat
[02:11.28]I feel like I'm drownin' got this water 'round my neck
[02:14.42]Cocky n***a throwin' ashes on Pateks
[02:17.19]Went to the trench store threw up the treys on the mat
[02:19.80]Yeah
[02:21.60]They be callin' me you hangin' with dangerous
[02:24.43]I'm just slidin' 'til I rest just for Uncle Raymond
[02:27.74]All my sibling's kids know your uncle famous
[02:30.48]I know this s**t sound dumb and the strangest
[02:33.96]In the trenches I feel the safest
[02:37.05]On the radio shoutout Nephets
[02:39.57]Did it off the love I gave 'em faces
[02:43.16]Oh
[02:46.11]Close that backdoor can't get shaked at by my homie
[02:48.45]No no no no no yeah yeah
[02:52.00]Close that backdoor 'cause I know that s**t's phony
[02:54.38]No no no no no whoa
[02:57.72]Close that backdoor can't get snaked by my homie
[03:02.59]Oh
[03:03.51]Close that backdoor 'cause I know this love phony
[03:06.56]Oh
[03:09.19]Close that backdoor can't get shaked at by my homie
[03:11.79]No no no no no yeah yeah
[03:15.16]Close that backdoor 'cause I know that s**t's phony
[03:17.30]No no no no no
data.trans:
[ti:Backdoor (Explicit)]
[ar:Lil Durk]
[al:Backdoor (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.16]//
[00:00.32]//
[00:00.49]MalikOTB制作
[00:03.48]//
[00:04.72]//
[00:08.44]//
[00:09.20]//
[00:10.22]//
[00:12.00]Turn Me Up Josh制作
[00:14.39]//
[00:24.55]他们装作不需要我们的样子
[00:26.70]他们亦步亦趋 他们想成为我们这样的人
[00:29.59]我的朋友吞下药片 他们兴奋不已
[00:32.35]他宁愿尽情挥霍 而不是补充好货
[00:35.10]当一切进展顺利时 你不在这个街区
[00:37.51]当一切进展顺利时 我不会担心其他虎视眈眈的人
[00:40.35]我们不会跟三观不合的哥们厮混 不要追问我们在干什么
[00:43.34]这是我们唯一能打赢官司的机会 你拿出照相手机
[00:46.07]我以前把Lil' Mo'的名字写在塑料杯子上
[00:49.09]我必须教会这些成年人明辨是非
[00:52.21]为什么州政府告诉陪审团 他们想起诉所有人
[00:54.94]律师给了他们宣誓书 他们最好乖乖签字
[00:58.58]我在Instagram上认识一位辣妹 她展现独特魅力
[01:01.59]她告诉Bandz我给她买了一只铂金包 我跟她无话不说
[01:04.34]我总是带着枪 开着宾利车驰骋
[01:07.11]我们准备好弹药 这是城里的规矩
[01:09.97]我讨厌这些想要改变街区的家伙
[01:12.97]我和杀手形影不离 他们杀个片甲不留
[01:16.01]我来自城里 当心你的伙伴
[01:18.78]你对那个开枪干掉你的家伙毫无还手之力
[01:21.76]在你走出那扇门之前 你的拿上格洛克手枪
[01:24.53]不能为女人失去心智 这是妈妈给我的教诲
[01:27.49]关闭商店 我拿钱解决一切
[01:30.42]你曾让我处于人生低谷 我带着枪招摇过市
[01:33.11]//
[01:36.09]关上后门 不要被我的朋友吓到瑟瑟发抖
[01:38.94]//
[01:42.36]关上后门 因为我知道这是弄虚作假
[01:44.90]//
[01:47.78]关上后门 不要被我的朋友耍得团团转
[01:53.24]//
[01:53.62]关上后门 因为我知道这是虚情假意
[01:58.47]孤注一掷
[02:00.09]我是《美国之声》的佼佼者 这意味着无与伦比 他是威胁
[02:02.65]不要紧张 因为我的朋友纵享欢乐
[02:05.38]我知道你朋友的遭遇 不要步他的后尘
[02:08.58]她为了街区卷土重来 我斜戴着帽子
[02:11.28]我觉得我快要溺水 我的脖子上戴满钻石
[02:14.42]傲慢自大的人对百达翡丽手表不屑一顾
[02:17.19]来到街头商店里 把钱扔在垫子上
[02:19.80]//
[02:21.60]他们在呼唤我 你和危险的人混迹在一起
[02:24.43]我奋力拼搏 直到我停下脚步 只是为了Raymond叔叔
[02:27.74]我兄弟姐妹的孩子都知道你的叔叔声名远扬
[02:30.48]我知道这听起来很傻 很奇怪
[02:33.96]在这鱼龙混杂的街区 我感觉最安全
[02:37.05]在广播里 为Nephets欢呼
[02:39.57]为了爱付出一切 我维护他们的颜面
[02:43.16]//
[02:46.11]关上后门 不要被我的朋友吓到瑟瑟发抖
[02:48.45]//
[02:52.00]关上后门 因为我知道这是弄虚作假
[02:54.38]//
[02:57.72]关上后门 不要被我的朋友耍得团团转
[03:02.59]//
[03:03.51]关上后门 因为我知道这是虚情假意
[03:06.56]//
[03:09.19]关上后门 不要被我的朋友吓到瑟瑟发抖
[03:11.79]//
[03:15.16]关上后门 因为我知道这是弄虚作假
[03:17.30]//
